translations: v.释放出，发泄（力量、感情等）；解开皮带放开（动物）；放开，解除对……的限制

phrs.translation: 释放, 发动, 解放, 发泄
释放混乱, 兔子爱吃肉
释放你的手指, 三星手机
把野兽从禁制中解放, 唱片名

sentences.sentence: The officers were still reluctant to unleash their troops in pursuit of a defeated enemy.
sentences.translation: 军官们仍不愿发兵追击溃敌。

sentences.sentence: At the same time, however, some of these applications threaten to unleash forces over which we have no control.
sentences.translation: 然而，与此同时，其中一些应用程序可能释放出我们无法控制的力量。

sentences.sentence: California has spent years preparing for "The Big One"—the inevitable earthquake that will undoubtedly unleash all kinds of havoc along the famous San Andreas fault.
sentences.translation: 加州已经用了数年时间准备“大招”——一定会沿着著名的圣安德烈亚斯断层释放各种破坏的一场不可避免的地震。
